message: Chakra UI is a simple, modular and accessible component library that gives you the building blocks you need to build your React applications.
less-code-description: Spend less time writing UI code and more time building a great experience for your customers.

feature-section.title: An experience you'd expect from a design system
feature-section.description: Opinionated and designed for daily use.

accessible.title: Accessible
accessible.description: Chakra UI strictly follows WAI-ARIA standards for all components.

themeable.title: Themeable
themeable.description: Customize any part of our components to match your design needs.

composable.title: Composable
composable.description: Designed with composition in mind. Compose new components with ease.

light-and-dark-ui.title: Light and Dark UI
light-and-dark-ui.description: Optimized for multiple color modes. Use light or dark, your choice.

developer-experience.title: Developer Experience
developer-experience.description: Guaranteed to boost your productivity when building your app or website.

active-community.title: Active Community
active-community.description: We're a team of active maintainers ready to help you whenever you need.

built-with-chakra-section.title: Built with Chakra UI ‚ö°Ô∏è
built-with-chakra-section.description: A collection of websites and projects built with Chakra UI

growing-section.title: Chakra is growing quickly
growing-section.description: We're dedicated to improving the experience and performance of Chakra UI.

loved-by-product-people-section.title: Loved by product people like you

support-chakra-ui-section.title: Support Chakra UI üíñ
support-chakra-ui-section.description: Our maintainers devote their time, effort, and heart to ensure Chakra UI keeps getting better. Support us by donating to our collective üôè

event-section.title: Invite us to speak at your next event
event-section.description: Want a Chakra UI core team member to speak at your next event? Invite us to create a memorable and engaging experience for your attendees.

seo.title: Chakra UI - A simple, modular and accessible component library that gives you the building blocks you need to build your React applications.
seo.description: Simple, Modular and Accessible UI Components for your React Applications. Built with Styled System
